plot: When a thief steals two urns full of silver from the Pharao's treasury, the Princess devises a cunning plan to trap the thief who dishonored her father.
title: De dief
plot_es: When a thief steals two urns full of silver from the Pharao's treasury, the Princess devises a cunning plan to trap the thief who dishonored her father.
plot_en: When a thief steals two urns full of silver from the Pharao's treasury, the Princess devises a cunning plan to trap the thief who dishonored her father.
